title: Looking for Indian respondents
selftext:
Hi everyone,  
I am working on a research project for my graduation degree. I need responses from Indian people about their payment decisions regarding hired domestic help for their households.  


It will take around 3-4 minutes maximum, all questions are rank-based and won't require you to type anything out. Please help me out, thank you in advance! :)

 https://sprw.io/stt-oTeMXhUAKb8FuSzpn1eF1S
comments:
Hey, I'm lookin for respondents too...I have filled yours, it would be helpful if you filled mine too!

https://forms.gle/XU64C35JbPQgR71C7
